name: Huabo Lu
content: Huabo Lu Huabo Lu Associate Teaching Professor and MS Computing Graduate Coordinator College of Engineering School of Computing (316) 978-5265 huabo.lu@wichita.edu Office hours: 2-3 p.m. Tuesday and 2-3 p.m. Thursday 251, Jabara Hall Main Campus Overview Dr. Huabo Lu believes that learning is a joyful, lifetime activity. He encourages students to explore the natural and artificial beauty of computer science. Keep Calm and {Code | Read | Write | Debug | Analyze} On. * Office Hours (Fall 2025) - Tue/Thur 2:00 - 3:00 pm. - Walk-in welcome when the door is open. - I use MS Teams. Leave me messages if any questions. www.wichita.edu/services/linkedin-learning/ Information Academic Interests and Expertise Education Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, Wichita State University M.Sc. in Computer Networking, Wichita State University B.Sc. in Computer Science and Technology, Beijing Forestry University Areas of Research Interest Undergraduate Capstone Projects, Privacy Preserving Technologies Areas of Teaching Interest Databases, Algorithms, .NET technologies. ©
